title: Introducing: To The Wedding
content:
(Photo – Olivia Lee)

To The Wedding is the moniker of San Francisco based multi-instrumentalist Lauren Grubb.

As the drummer of Minipop, this is Grubb’s platform to create beautifully haunting melodrama, perfect for the widescreen. First offering Silver Currents is a slow burner, bubbling away until a seriously 90′s leaning guitar outro, channeling the vibes of Mazzy Star an Slowdive. Grubb’s voice is the centerpiece of it all, emotive and crooning, drawing you in and leaving you completely encapsulated for the full five minutes and fifty seconds.

Stream Silver Currents below:
